AAv.caption: Dictionary
AAv.doc: The dictionary of symbols or characters to sample from.
AAv.name: dictionary

AAw.caption: Sample Size
AAw.doc: The number of samples to draw with replacement from the dictionary.
AAw.name: samples

ABb.caption: Crytographically strong random sampling with replacement from the text, which acts as the dictionary of characters or symbols.
ABb.name: information
